name: #LDJAM40 - Graveyard Shift
description:
Try to save as much money as you can. Caution, carrying money slows you down! So deposit as much as you can into the bank (the gold piggy banks). Try to get the highscore!

VOTE HERE: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/40/graveyard-shift

WASD or Left Thumb-Stick ---- move
left mouse button or Right Trigger --- shoot
E or gamepad left face button ---- deposit coins into bank
